bill_title: establish certain Legislative findings with regard to Article XXIX, section 1 of the Constitution.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain Legislative findings with regard to Article XXIX, section 1 of the Constitution. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Legislature finds that, in its judgment, public necessities require the implementation of the provisions of Article XXIX, section 1 of the Constitution with regard to packing houses. Section 2. The Legislature further finds that the provisions of Article XXIX, section 1 may be accomplished by means of joint ventures between private enterprises and the State of South Dakota, by means of contracting for operational management, or by means of prepurchasing of product. Section 3. The Governor may implement the provisions of this Act by charging any state agency in the Executive Branch with conducting feasibility studies, negotiations, and preparation of contracts or legislation as may be appropriate. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
